page.title: 09A school that closed.
page.content: Bethan Vale lives in the "Folly", Llanteg. She writes "I am 8 years old. I get up at 8 o'clock. I have a cat and a dog. My favourite sweets are all kinds except mints. Before going to Stepaside School I went to Amroth School. I moved because it had to close because there were not enough pupils in it." Christian is 7. He writes "I was in Amroth School and I moved because there were not enough pupils in Amroth School. Amroth School closed in l982. The number of pupils had fallen to about l2. Some came to Stepaside School and some went to other schools. There were two teachers in that school and one moved to Stepaside."
